articles.title: Microsoft enters 10-year agreement with Nvidia and Nintendo in fight to save Activision deal - CNN
articles.description: Microsoft announced it has agreed to partnerships with Nvidia and Nintendo as it tries to convince European Union officials to approve its $69 billion purchase of Activision Blizzard — the company behind the popular game franchise Call of Duty.

articles.title: Conifer-killing beetles use smell of beneficial fungus to select host trees - Phys.org

articles.title: China and Europe team up on tests before joint space mission in 2025 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: It marks first time a satellite made in China is shipped to European Space Agency, and for a Chinese team to help assemble and test at an ESA facility.

articles.title: Leaked Document Outlines Russia’s 2030 Belarus ‘Annexation’ Strategy – Report - The Moscow Times
articles.description: A previously unreported Kremlin strategy document purports to lay out in detail Russia’s plans to absorb neighboring Belarus by 2030, U.S. and European media reported Tuesday.
